response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true value might be subjective based on your specific needs and goals. With that in mind, I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you have the opportunity to experience the benefits firsthand without committing to a higher cost upfront. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions about how this product can meet your requirements.", "product_price": 15000}
